CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Address_Line_1__c), "", Address_Line_1__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(Address_Line_2__c), "", Address_Line_2__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(City__c), "", City__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(State__c), "", State__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(Postal_Code__c), "", Postal_Code__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(Country__c), "", Country__c )
CustomField.label: Full Address
